line_1: Bring, ye bright fair, your love-attending crouds;
line_2: Command your slain, ye heroes, from their shrouds;

line_1: Around their Monarch-Mouse the Nation crouds,
line_2: WHEN rosy-finger'd Morn had ting'd the Clouds,

line_1: And rain'd destruction on the gasping crouds.
line_2: O'er shrinking nations steer'd malignant clouds,
Fast to the driving winds the marshall'd clouds
All slow, and wan, and wrap'd with Shrouds,
